attributes.action: GET OUR FREEDOM OF SPEECH BACK
attributes.background: WE WANT OUR FREEDOM OF SPEECH RETURNED. SINCE THE PROTESTS IN LONDON WE FEEL WE CANT SAY ANYTHING ANYMORE INCASE IT OFFENDS SOMEONE, NEARLY EVERYTHING WE SAY IS NOW BRANDED AS BEING RACIST EVEN THOUGH IT IS NOT

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We understand that you are concerned about freedom of speech, but we're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do.

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
